foreignData.name: Friedensverhandlungen
foreignData.text: Während dieses Zuges und während des nächsten Zuges können Spieler keinen Angriff deklarieren und keine Zaubersprüche sprechen oder Fähigkeiten benutzen, die auf eine bleibende Karte oder einen Spieler zielen.

name: Peace Talks
originalText: During this turn and the next one, players cannot declare an attack and cannot play spells or abilities that target any permanent or player.

rulings.text: Can be cast after your attack.

It affects the current turn and the next turn. This could affect the same player twice if they have two turns in a row, or it could affect different players. In a multiplayer game it affects exactly two turns, not a full round of turns.
Doesn’t skip the Combat Phase, just renders creatures unable to attack.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

text: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.
